document.full_text: american spencer levin, seeking his first pga tour title, fired an immaculate six-under-par 66 for a three-shot lead after the first round of the arnold palmer invitational on thursday.
document.title: american levin charges into bay hill lead
lines_and_colors: american spencer levin, seeking his first pga tour title, fired an immaculate six-under-par 66 for a three-shot lead after the first round of the arnold palmer invitational on thursday.
